name: Midori Gaiden
description:
Just a side story featuring a younger Midori, which takes place centuries before the events of Colourless.

A short scene (~5 mins) about the last surviving fairy, defending her forest against humans... or so it seems.

Made for the Let's Make a Scene: Sounds of Harmony Contest.

Credits

Graphics: DBDragoner,  hiddenone, KADOKAWA / Komodo, mon, whtdragon

Sound Effects: KADOKAWA / Komodo, YouFulca

Music: Joel Steudler, Sonancy Designs, Tyler Cline

Plugins: Aesica, Galv, HimeWorks, Moghunter, Victor Sant, waynee95, Yanfly

Made with RPG Maker MV.
